segments.advisor_message: So, tell me about your current living situation. I mean, do you own your place or is it rented?
segments.client_message: Um, right, right, uh... I actually, I rent this, this apartment, right? And, um, yeah, it’s in, like, uh, Cambridge. And the, um, yeah, the postcode is CB2 1AA, I think? I kinda forget, ha! Oh! And I moved in, like, uh, a few months ago, back in April, yeah, April, I think?
